oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Hādhā al-kitāb min Tafsīr al-kalām al-qadīm al-dāʼim / taʼlīf ʻallāmat zamānih al-Shaykh ʻAbd al-Razzāq ibn Jamāl al-Dīn Abī al-Ghanāʼim al-Qāshānī : manuscript, 1551
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: ʻAbd al-Razzāq al-Qāshānī , -1330?
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black and red.

Ownership statements on f. 2r dated 1245 AH [1829 or 30 AD] (Ḥasan ibn Bāqir al-Ḥasanī al-Ḥusaynī and 1281 AH [1864 or 65 AD] (Muḥammad Anīs al-Ṭālawī). Ownership statement on rear fly leaf [4] by Nāṣir al-M.rāyātī (?) dated 15 Muḥarram 1241 AH [August 30, 1825 AD].
According to paragraph beginning l.14 on f. 254r, book completed on 22 Ramaḍān 729 AH [July 19, 1329 AD].
According to a note on f. 255r, copy completed in 958 AH [1551 AD] in the hand of Ghaḍanfar ibn ʻAbd Allāh.
MS Arab 79. Houghton Library, Harvard University.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Islam--Doctrines
Islamic law--Interpretation and construction
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: هذا الكتاب من تفسير الكلام القديم الدائم / تأليف علامة زمانه الشيخ عبد الرزاق بن جمال الدين أبي الغنائم القاشاني : مخطوطة، 1551
